means: 一齐射击，快速连续射击，（批评等）连续猛烈的迸发
用猛烈炮火击落（或攻击）

sentence.Network_en: Both were killed in a fusillade of bullets fired at close range.
sentence.Network_cn: 两人都是在近距离扫射中丧命的。

sentence.Network_en: Our fusillade from the left flank caught them by surprise.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在左翼的齐鸣射击把他们打懵了.
枪炮一齐射击来攻击某个目标.

PerfectNetExp.abs: fusilier 燧发枪手fusillade 连续射击fusion bomb 热核弹
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... defilade 遮蔽，掩护 fusillade （枪炮）齐射，连发 accolade 推崇备至，赞扬.
furtive 偷偷地fusillade 齐发fuss 大惊小怪
furtive adj．偷偷的，秘密的fusillade n．（枪炮）齐射，连发fuss n．大惊小怪，过份照顾

list.abs: propelling a fusillade of cannonball - size an approaching asteroid., 发射一连串如炮弹大小的钢球去撞击来袭的小行星.
propelling a fusillade of cannonball - size an approaching asteroid., 发射一连串如炮弹大小的钢球去撞击来袭的小行星.
A fusillade of insults ., 接连不断的侮辱.
propelling a fusillade of cannonball - size an approaching asteroid., 发射一连串如炮弹大小的钢球去撞击来袭的小行星.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, from fusiller 'to shoot', from fusil (see fusil)

entry.def: A fusillade of shots or objects is a large number of them fired or thrown at the same time.

example.ex: Both were killed in a fusillade of bullets fired at close range.
example.tran: 两人都是在近距离扫射中丧命的。

sentences.sentence: "our fusillade from the left flank caught them by surprise"

auth_sentence.content: By the time the fusillade ended, two members of the strike force had died, and the rest had been apprehended.
auth_sentence.res_content: By the time the fusillade ended, two members of the strike force had died, and the rest had been apprehended.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By the time the fusillade ended, two members of the strike force had died, and the rest had been apprehended.
